name: jsrf_characters
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool jet_set_radio_api.
Tool description: A data provider for all things Jet Set Radio in JSON format!
API description: Fetches a list of JSRF (Jet Set Radio Future) characters based on given parameters.

limit.description: The maximum number of items to return in the response. Default is '5'.

orderby.description: The order in which to sort items. Possible values are 'asc' (ascending) and 'desc' (descending). Default is 'asc'. This parameter has an effect only if `sortby` is also provided.

sortby.description: The field by which to sort the items. Possible values include any field on the document such as 'name' or 'stats'. Default is 'name'.
